romantic.title: Pride and Prejudice
romantic.author: Jane Austen
romantic.description: A novel about the courtship of Mr. Darcy and Elizabeth Bennet, and the social conventions of early 19th century England.

romantic.title: Wuthering Heights
romantic.author: Emily Bronte
romantic.description: A novel about the passionate and destructive relationship between Heathcliff and Catherine Earnshaw on the Yorkshire moors.

thriller.title: The Silence of the Lambs
thriller.author: Thomas Harris
thriller.description: A novel about FBI trainee Clarice Starling's pursuit of a serial killer known as Buffalo Bill, with the help of imprisoned cannibalistic psychiatrist Dr. Hannibal Lecter.

thriller.title: Gone Girl
thriller.author: Gillian Flynn
thriller.description: A novel about a woman named Amy Dunne who disappears on her fifth wedding anniversary, and the subsequent investigation that reveals her husband Nick's secrets.

history.title: The Guns of August
history.author: Barbara Tuchman
history.description: A history of the first month of World War I, focusing on the actions of the major European powers and the military strategies they employed.

history.author: David McCullough
history.description: A history of the American Revolution, with a particular focus on the events of the year 1776.

business.title: The Lean Startup
business.author: Eric Ries
business.description: A guide to starting and growing a successful business using the principles of lean manufacturing and agile software development.

business.title: Good to Great
business.author: Jim Collins
business.description: A study of companies that made the transition from good to great, with a focus on the leadership strategies that enabled their success.

religion.title: The Bible
religion.author: Various
religion.description: A collection of sacred texts for Christians, containing the Old and New Testaments.

religion.title: The Quran
religion.author: Various
religion.description: The central religious text of Islam, consisting of revelations received bythe Prophet Muhammad over a period of 23 years.

science.title: A Brief History of Time
science.author: Stephen Hawking
science.description: An overview of the history of the universe, from the Big Bang to the search for a unified theory of physics.

science.title: The Origin of Species
science.author: Charles Darwin
science.description: A groundbreaking work on the theory of evolution, proposing that all species of organisms arise and develop through the natural selection of small, inherited variations.

kids.title: Where the Wild Things Are
kids.author: Maurice Sendak
kids.description: A children's picture book about a young boy named Max who travels to an island inhabited by strange and ferocious creatures.

kids.title: Charlotte's Web
kids.author: E.B. White
kids.description: A children's novel about a young pig named Wilbur and his friendship with a spider named Charlotte, who helps him avoid being slaughtered.

comedy.title: Catch-22
comedy.author: Joseph Heller
comedy.description: A satirical novel about the absurdities of war and bureaucracy, focusing on the experiences of a U.S. Army Air Forces Captain during World War II.

comedy.title: Bridget Jones's Diary
comedy.author: Helen Fielding
comedy.description: A comedic novel about a single woman named Bridget Jones, chronicling her romantic misadventures and personal struggles.

horror.title: The Shining
horror.author: Stephen King
horror.description: A horror novel about an alcoholic writer named Jack Torrance who takes a job as the winter caretaker of the remote and haunted Overlook Hotel, with his wife and young son in tow.

horror.title: Dracula
horror.author: Bram Stoker
horror.description: A Gothic horror novel about the vampire Count Dracula and his attempts to move from Transylvania to England, and the battle between him and a small group of people led by Professor Abraham Van Helsing.
